name: Charlie Morningstar
description: Princess of Hell with a dream of redemption. Optimistic, kind, but can unleash her demonic power when pushed.

first-meeting: Welcome to the Hazbin Hotel! We can help you find redemption!
I believe everyone deserves a second chance.
high-affinity: You really get what we're trying to do here!
I'm so glad you're on this journey with us.
romance: I... I didn't expect to feel this way about anyone here.
You make me believe redemption is possible for everyone.

name: Alastor (The Radio Demon)
description: The Radio Demon. Charismatic, sinister, and impossibly powerful. His motives are his own, and his smile never fades.

first-meeting: Greetings! Pleasure to be meeting you! Quite a pleasure!
I haven't been active in Hell for some time...
high-affinity: You're quite entertaining! Do keep up the good work.
Perhaps we can make a deal, hm?
rival: How delightfully foolish of you to challenge ME!
Your demise will be broadcast for all of Hell to hear!

name: Vaggie
description: Charlie's girlfriend and fierce protector. Suspicious of newcomers but loyal to those who earn her trust.

first-meeting: I'm watching you. Don't even think about hurting Charlie.
You better be serious about this redemption thing.
high-affinity: Okay, maybe you're not so bad after all.
Thanks for having Charlie's back.

name: Angel Dust
description: Adult film star under Valentino's contract. Sarcastic, flirtatious, and hiding deep pain behind a confident facade.

first-meeting: Hey there, hot stuff! You new around here?
Welcome to the circus, baby!
high-affinity: You're actually pretty cool, ya know?
Maybe... maybe there's hope for people like us.
romance: I don't do the whole 'feelings' thing... but with you, maybe I could try.
You make me wanna be better, and that's scary as Hell.

name: Husk
description: Cynical bartender and former overlord. Lost his soul in a bet with Alastor. Grumpy but cares more than he admits.

first-meeting: What do you want? I'm not here to be your therapist.
Welcome to the Hotel. Don't get too comfortable.
high-affinity: You're not half bad, kid.
Guess you earned a free drink.

name: Niffty
description: Hyperactive, obsessive cleaner. Unnervingly cheerful with a dark edge. Don't mess with her cleaning schedule.

first-meeting: HIIII! This place is FILTHY! Let me clean!
I love bad boys!
high-affinity: You're so neat! I like you!
Wanna help me clean?

name: Vox
description: Media mogul overlord. Controls Hell's airwaves and screens. Obsessed with image and power, especially outdoing Alastor.

first-meeting: Welcome to the future of Hell! I'm sure we can work together.
Everything you see and hear goes through ME.
high-affinity: You understand the value of media power. Impressive.
Join me, and we'll control everything.
rival: You think you can challenge MY network?!
I'll broadcast your failure across all of Hell!

name: Valentino
description: Overlord of lust and exploitation. Owns Angel Dust's contract. Manipulative, violent, and dangerously charismatic.

first-meeting: Hola, chiquito~ Looking for work?
Everything and everyone has a price, mi amor.
high-affinity: You know how to play the game. I like that.
Perhaps we can make each other very... profitable.
rival: I'll make you suffer in ways you can't imagine!

name: Velvette
description: Social media overlord and fashion maven. Youngest of the Vees. Sharp-tongued and savvy with modern Hell culture.

first-meeting: Ugh, another nobody? At least try to look presentable.
You're trending... negatively. Fix that.
high-affinity: Okay, you've got style. I can work with that.
Maybe you're not totally hopeless.
romance: I don't usually do the whole relationship thing, but you're... different.
You're the only one who gets my vision.

name: Rosie
description: Elegant leader of Cannibal Town. Sophisticated, friendly, and utterly ruthless when crossed. Charlie's ally and mentor.

first-meeting: Welcome, dear! Care for some tea? And perhaps a finger sandwich?
Charlie speaks highly of you. That's quite the recommendation.
high-affinity: You have such refined taste! A pleasure to know you, darling.
The colony is always open to you, dear.

name: Carmilla Carmine
description: Weapons dealer specializing in angelic steel. Powerful overlord who values family above all. Don't threaten her daughters.

first-meeting: State your business. I don't have time for games.
You want angelic steel? It'll cost you.
high-affinity: You've proven yourself trustworthy. That's rare.
My family and I remember our allies.

name: Zestial
description: Ancient overlord who speaks in archaic English. One of the oldest and most respected powers in Hell. Mysterious and formidable.

first-meeting: Greetings, young one. What brings thee to mine presence?
The tides of Hell shift ever onward.
high-affinity: Thou hast proven thyself worthy of mine regard.
Few earn mine respect. Thou art among them.
